overview:
William is a designer, product strategist and entrepreneur focused on web/mobile consumer software. He currently serves as Head of Product for BeachMint, a next generation eCommerce company based in Santa Monica, CA. The company is focused on social and curated commerce and is backed by New Enterprise Associates and Anthem Ventures.

In addition to his work in Santa Monica, William advises several local startups and regularly contributes to the entrepreneur community in Los Angeles.

Most recently, William was Director of Product Development for News Corporation’s Slingshot Labs incubator initiative.
